mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.MOMENTID, M.WRITER, M.CATEGORY, M.LOCATION, M.TEXT, M.POSTTIME, C.CONTENTID, C.REFERENCEID, C.CONTENTPATH1, C.CONTENTPATH2, C.CONTENTPATH3, C.CONTENTPATH4, C.CONTENTPATH5, C.CONTENTPATH6, C.CONTENTPATH7, C.CONTENTPATH8, C.CONTENTPATH9, C.CONTENTPATH10, ROWNUM AS RN FROM MOMENT M JOIN CONTENTSRC C ON M.MOMENTID = C.REFERENCEID WHERE C.CONTENTTYPE = 1 ORDER BY M.MOMENTID DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{start + perPage - 1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOMENT M JOIN CONTENTSRC C ON M.MOMENTID = C.REFERENCEID WHERE C.CONTENTTYPE = 1
